meta.title: Regie.ai Review 2026: AI Sales Engagement Features, Pricing & G2 Ratings | SalesAIGuide
meta.description: Evidence-based review of Regie.ai's AI sales engagement platform. Covers pricing, G2 ratings, strengths, weaknesses, and who it's best for in 2026.

jsonLd.name: Regie.ai
jsonLd.description: AI-powered sales engagement platform for prospecting content generation, sequence automation, and AI dialer capabilities.

hero.tagline: AI sales engagement platform — prospecting content, sequences, and AI dialer in one
hero.dataSource: Evidence from G2, Reddit, vendor docs & more
hero.noteHtml: Scores synthesized from public reviews across G2, Reddit, LinkedIn communities, and vendor documentation.

quickSummary.verdict: Regie.ai is a mature AI sales engagement platform (345 G2 reviews, 4.4/5) that combines AI content generation, sequence automation, and an AI dialer. Strong for enterprise GTM teams wanting to consolidate tools, but the $35K/year starting price and heavy onboarding requirements make it a poor fit for SMBs or teams wanting quick time-to-value.
quickSummary.bestFor: Enterprise SDR teams and RevOps leaders wanting to consolidate sales engagement, content generation, and dialing into one AI-native platform
quickSummary.avoidIf: SMBs, startups, or teams with tight budgets — $35K/year minimum is enterprise-only pricing

whatIs.heading: What Is Regie.ai?
whatIs.body: Regie.ai is an AI sales engagement platform designed for enterprise GTM teams. Its flagship product, RegieOne, combines three capabilities: AI Agents for prospecting and sequence automation, an AI Dialer for call-based outreach, and AI content generation for emails, call scripts, and LinkedIn messages. The platform is built around the idea of consolidating the modern sales tech stack — replacing separate tools for sequencing, dialing, and content generation with a single AI-native platform. Regie.ai integrates natively with Outreach, Salesloft, and Salesforce.

features.name: AI Agents (Prospecting)
features.description: Autonomous agents that research prospects, build targeted lists, and generate personalized outreach sequences.

features.name: AI Dialer
features.description: Parallel dialing with AI-generated call scripts, real-time coaching, and automatic call logging.

features.name: RegieOne Platform
features.description: Unified platform combining AI Agents + AI Dialer + content generation — designed to replace Outreach/Salesloft for AI-native teams.

features.name: Rapid Writer
features.description: AI content generation for emails, LinkedIn messages, and call scripts with brand voice controls.

features.name: Dynamic Workflows
features.description: Adaptive sequences that adjust messaging based on prospect engagement signals.

features.name: CRM & SEP Integrations
features.description: Native integrations with Salesforce, Outreach, and Salesloft for data sync and workflow continuity.

pricing.noteHtml: Regie.ai uses enterprise pricing with annual contracts. The RegieOne bundle (AI Agents + AI Dialer) is offered free with an annual AI Agents contract starting at $35K/year.

tiers.name: AI Agents
tiers.description: AI prospecting agents, sequence automation, content generation — annual contract

tiers.name: AI Agents + AI Dialer
tiers.description: Full RegieOne platform including AI Dialer — same base price as AI Agents alone

tiers.name: RegieOne
tiers.description: Unified platform access included with annual AI Agents subscription

tiers.name: Professional Services
tiers.description: Onboarding, training, and implementation support priced separately

pricing.freeTrialNote: No free trial — enterprise sales process required

positiveThemes: Strong AI content generation for emails and call scripts
Rapid Writer feature praised for speed and quality
Effective at increasing call volume with AI Dialer
Good for consolidating prospecting and engagement tools
negativeThemes: AI output can be generic without significant fine-tuning
Heavy onboarding requirements — not quick to deploy
Cannot handle manual call tasks without prior AI engagement
Workflows feel complex relative to the value delivered for some teams
g2Reviews.compositeInsight: Composite insight from public sources: With 345 G2 reviews and a 4.4/5 rating, Regie.ai has meaningful validation. Users consistently praise the content generation speed and AI Dialer call volume increases. The main friction points are onboarding complexity and AI output quality requiring manual tuning — both common enterprise platform challenges.

bestFor: Enterprise SDR teams (50+ reps) running high-volume outbound
RevOps leaders wanting to consolidate SEP, dialer, and content tools
GTM teams already using Outreach or Salesloft looking for an AI-native alternative
Organizations with budget for $35K+ annual contracts and dedicated onboarding time
notFor: SMBs and startups — pricing starts at $35K/year
Teams wanting quick time-to-value — onboarding is heavy
Individual reps or small teams (under 10 SDRs)
Teams that rely heavily on manual call tasks without prior AI engagement

verdict.summary: Regie.ai is a credible, well-reviewed enterprise AI sales engagement platform. The 345 G2 reviews and 4.4/5 rating provide real validation. The $35K/year floor and heavy onboarding requirements mean it's only appropriate for enterprise teams with dedicated RevOps support.
verdict.bestFor: Enterprise GTM teams wanting to consolidate sales engagement, AI content generation, and dialing into one AI-native platform
verdict.whoShouldNotBuy: SMBs, startups, or any team without a $35K+ annual budget and dedicated onboarding resources

faqs.a: RegieOne is Regie.ai's unified platform that combines AI Agents (prospecting and sequence automation), AI Dialer, and content generation in a single interface. It is offered free with an annual AI Agents contract starting at $35K/year.

faqs.q: How does Regie.ai compare to Outreach and Salesloft?
faqs.a: Regie.ai is positioned as an AI-native alternative to traditional SEPs. It has stronger AI content generation and includes a built-in AI Dialer, but has fewer integrations and a smaller ecosystem than Outreach or Salesloft. Teams deeply embedded in Outreach/Salesloft workflows often use Regie.ai alongside rather than as a replacement.
Regie.ai starts at $35,000/year for AI Agents. The RegieOne bundle (AI Agents + AI Dialer) is included at the same price. Professional services for onboarding and training are priced separately.
Yes. Regie.ai is SOC 2 compliant and GDPR compliant. SSO is available. The platform is listed on the Salesforce AppExchange, which requires security review.

faqs.q: Does Regie.ai have a free trial?
faqs.a: No. Regie.ai uses an enterprise sales process — a demo and sales conversation are required before access is provided.

finalCta.heading: Ready to evaluate Regie.ai?
finalCta.body: Visit Regie.ai to request a demo. We recommend comparing it against Outreach and Salesloft before committing to an annual contract.

sourcesChecked.finding: Strong validation with 345 reviews; content generation and call volume increases praised; onboarding complexity flagged
Positive sentiment on AI content quality; some users note it works best alongside existing SEPs rather than replacing them
RegieOne positioning as AI-native SEP replacement; $35K/yr pricing confirmed; SOC 2 and GDPR compliance confirmed
Listed on AppExchange — confirms Salesforce integration and security review completion
RevOps and sales leaders discuss Regie.ai as a consolidation play; most use cases are enterprise 50+ rep teams

enterpriseReadiness.overallNote: Regie.ai is enterprise-grade with SOC 2 compliance, SSO, and Salesforce AppExchange listing. Contract flexibility is limited — annual contracts required.

items.note: Enterprise admin controls for team management and campaign governance
GDPR compliant; specific data residency options not publicly documented

pairings.role: CRM — native integration for contact and pipeline sync
SEP — use alongside Regie.ai for teams transitioning to AI-native workflows
SEP — alternative integration path for Salesloft-native teams
Conversation intelligence — pair with Regie.ai for full call recording and coaching
Alternative — if you need SMB-friendly pricing with similar prospecting capabilities

stackFit.replaces: Separate SEP + dialer + content generation tools (Outreach/Salesloft + Orum/Nooks + Jasper/Copy.ai)
stackFit.avoidWith: Outreach or Salesloft as primary SEP — Regie.ai is designed to replace them, not complement them
